lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : ARMSTRONG, DIDO
[00:01.000] 作曲 : ARMSTRONG, DIDO
[00:02.530]My tea's gone cold, I'm wondering why I got out of bed at all
[00:08.140]the morning rain clouds up my window and I can't see at all
[00:14.150]And even if I could it'd all be grey, but your picture on my wall
[00:20.240]it reminds me that it's not so bad, it's not so bad
[00:26.770]My tea's gone cold, I'm wondering why I got out of bed at all
[00:32.160]the morning rain clouds up my window and I can't see at all
[00:38.200]And even if I could it'd all be grey, but your picture on my wall
[00:44.310]it reminds me that it's not so bad, it's not so bad
[00:47.630]
[00:49.490]Dear Slim, I wrote you but you still ain't callin'
[00:52.580]I left my cell, my pager, and my home phone at the bottom
[00:55.640]I sent two letters back in autumn You must not have got 'em
[00:58.570]There probably was a problem at the post office or somethin'
[01:01.540]
[01:01.720]Sometimes I scribble addresses too sloppy when I jot 'em
[01:04.520]But anyways, **** it, what's been up man, how's your daughter?
[01:07.580]My girlfriend's pregnant too, I'm out to be a father
[01:10.070]If I have a daughter, guess what I'm-a call her? I'm-a
[01:12.850]name her Bonnie.
[01:13.620]
[01:13.820]I read about your uncle Ronnie too, I'm sorry
[01:16.410]I had a friend kill himself over some ***** who didn't wanthim.
[01:19.520]I know you probably hear this everyday, but I'm your biggestfan.
[01:22.820]I even got the underground **** that you did with Scam.
[01:25.620]
[01:25.960]I got a room full of your posters and your pictures, man.
[01:28.900]I like the **** you did with Ruckus too, that **** was fat.
[01:31.800]Anyways, I hope you get this man, hit me back, just to chat
[01:35.410]Truly yours, your biggest fan, this is Stan.
[01:37.800]
[01:38.370]My tea’s gone cold, I'm wondering why I got out of bed at all
[01:44.050]the morning rain clouds up my window and I can't see at all
[01:50.030]And even if I could it'd all be grey， but   your picture on my wall
[01:56.090]it reminds me that it's not so bad, it's not so bad
[02:00.370]
[02:01.230]Dear Slim, you still ain't called or wrote,
[02:03.730]I hope you have the chance.
[02:04.750]I ain't mad, I just think it's ****** up you don't answer fans.
[02:07.850]If you didn't want to talk to me outside your concert
[02:10.470]You didn't have to but you could have signed an autograph for Matthew.
[02:13.560]That's my little brother, man. He's only 6 years old.
[02:15.720]We waited in the blistering cold for you for 4 hours and ya just said no.
[02:19.810]That's pretty ****ty man, you're like his ******' idol
[02:22.710]He wants to be just like you man, he likes you more
[02:24.830]than I do.
[02:25.520]
[02:25.700]I ain't that mad, but I just don't like bein' lied to.
[02:28.550]Remember when we met in Denver, you said if I write you
[02:31.480]You would write back. See, I'm just like you in a way.
[02:33.820]I never knew my father neither.
[02:35.630]He used to always cheat on my mom and beat her.
[02:37.770]
[02:37.970]I can relate to what you're sayin' in your songs.
[02:40.390]So when I have a ****ty day, I drift away and put 'em on.
[02:43.350]Cause I don't really got **** else, so that **** help when I'm depressed.
[02:46.480]I even got a tattoo with your name across the chest.
[02:49.170]
[02:49.590]Sometimes I even cut myself to see how much it bleeds.
[02:52.600]It's like adrenaline. The Pain is such a sudden rush for me.
[02:55.140]See, everything you say is real, and I respect you
[02:58.000]'cause you tell it.
[02:58.550]My girlfriend's jealous 'cause I talk about you 24/7.
[03:01.530]But she don't know you like I know you, Slim, no one does.
[03:04.330]She don't know what it was like for people like us growing up.
[03:07.410]You've gotta call me man. I'll be the biggest fan
[03:09.440]you'll ever lose.
[03:10.250]Sincerely yours, Stan. PS: We should be together too.
[03:13.380]
[03:13.550]My tea's gone cold, I'm wondering why I got out of bed at all
[03:20.030]the morning rain clouds up my window and I can't see at all
[03:26.030]And even if I could it'd all be grey, to put your picture on my wall
[03:32.040]it reminds me that it's not so bad, it's not so bad
[03:36.810]
[03:37.050]Dear Mr. "I'm too good to call or write my fans"
[03:40.270]This'll be the last package I ever send your ass.
[03:43.390]It's been six months and still no word. I don't deserve it?
[03:46.000]I know you got my last two letters, I wrote the addresses on 'em perfect.
[03:49.480]
[03:49.670]So this is my cassette I'm sending you. I hope you hear it.
[03:52.140]I'm in the car right now. I'm doing 90 on the freeway.
[03:55.380]Hey Slim, "I drank a fifth of vodka, ya dare me to drive?"
[03:58.900]You know that song by Phil Collins from "The Air In The Night"?
[04:01.850]About that guy who could have saved that other guy fromdrowning?
[04:04.690]But didn't? Then Phil saw it all then at his show he found him?
[04:07.580]That's kinda how this is. You could have rescued me fromdrowning.
[04:10.470]Now it's too late. I'm on a thousand downers now, I'm drowsy.
[04:13.040]
[04:13.290]And all I wanted was a lousy letter or a call.
[04:16.340]I hope you know I ripped all o' your pictures off the wall.
[04:19.530]I love you Slim, we could have been together. Think about it.
[04:22.920]You ruined it now, I hope you can't sleep and you dream about it.
[04:26.050]And when you dream, I hope you can't sleep and you scream about it.
[04:29.000]I hope your conscious eats at you and you can't breathe without me.
[04:32.380]See Slim, shut up *****, I'm trying to talk
[04:34.560]Hey Slim, that's my girlfriend screaming in the trunk.
[04:37.490]But I didn't slit her throat,
[04:38.760]I just tied her up, see I ain't like you.
[04:40.560]'Cause if she suffocates, she'll suffer more,
[04:42.710]and then she'll die too.
[04:43.880]Well, gotta go, I'm almost at the bridge now.
[04:46.750]Oh ****, I forgot, how am I supposed to send this **** out?
[04:49.800]
[04:50.740]screeching tires, crashing sounds, car splashes into thewater}
[04:59.490]
[05:01.890]My tea's  gone cold, I'm wondering why I got out of bed at all
[05:08.060]the morning rain clouds up my window and I can't see at all
[05:14.050]And even if I could it'd all be gray, but your picture on my wall
[05:20.180]it reminds me that it's not so bad, it's not so bad
[05:24.950]
[05:25.530]Dear Stan, I meant to write you sooner, but I've just been busy.
[05:28.480]You said your girlfriend's pregnant now, how far along is she?
[05:31.560]Look, I'm really flattered you would call your daughter that.
[05:34.420]And here's an autograph for your brother:
[05:36.010]I wrote it on your Starter cap.
[05:37.590]
[05:37.880]I'm sorry I didn't see you at the show, I must have missed you.
[05:40.910]Don't think I did that **** intentionally, just to diss you.
[05:43.920]And what's this **** you said about you like to cut your wrists too?
[05:47.050]I say that **** just clownin' dawg,
[05:48.570]c'mon, how ****** up is you?
[05:49.900]You got some issues, Stan, I think you need some counselin'
[05:52.550]To help your ass from bouncin' off the walls when you get down some.
[05:55.720]
[05:56.120]And what's this **** about us meant to be together?
[05:58.220]That type of ****'ll make me not want us to meet each other.
[06:01.450]I really think you and your girlfriend need each other.
[06:04.400]Or maybe you just need to treat her better.
[06:06.860]I hope you get to read this letter.
[06:08.520]I just hope it reaches you in time.
[06:10.330]Before you hurt yourself, I think that you'd be doin' just fine
[06:13.290]If you'd relax a little. I'm glad that I inspire you, but Stan
[06:16.460]Why are you so mad? Try to understand that I do want you as a fan.
[06:20.070]I just don't want you to do some crazy ****.
[06:22.530]I seen this one **** on the news a couple weeks ago that made me sick.
[06:25.680]Some dude was drunk and drove his car over a bridge
[06:28.470]And had his girlfriend in the trunk and she was
[06:30.370]pregnant with his kid
[06:31.350]And in the car they found a tape but it didn't say who it was to
[06:34.360]Come to think about it...his name was...it was you.
[06:37.550]Damn.
[06:40.030]
[06:40.320]

tlyric.lyric:
[00:02.530]茶越来越凉 我不知道为什么 始终辗转难眠
[00:08.140]清晨的雨遮住了我的窗 我根本就看不清
[00:14.150]能看到的只是一片灰色  但是你的照片在我的墙上
[00:20.240]它提醒着我 这不算坏 还不算太坏
[00:26.770]茶越来越凉 我不知道为什么 始终辗转难眠
[00:32.160]清晨的雨遮住了我的窗 我根本就看不清
[00:38.200]能看到的只是一片灰色  但是你的照片在我的墙上
[00:44.310]它提醒着我 这不算坏 还不算太坏
[00:47.630]
[00:49.490]亲爱的斯利姆 我写信给你 但你未答复
[00:52.580]我把我的地址 姓名和电话留在了信末
[00:55.640]秋天里发了两封信 你肯定都没有收到
[00:58.570]可能是邮局或者什么地方搞错了
[01:01.540]
[01:01.720]有时我总是把地址写得很潦草
[01:04.520]但又能怎样呢 管它呢 你的女儿好吗
[01:07.580]我的女友也怀孕 我就要做爸爸了
[01:10.070]如果是女孩，你猜我会叫她什么
[01:12.850]我会给她起名邦尼
[01:13.620]
[01:13.820]我得知了你罗尼叔叔的事我很难过
[01:16.410]我有一个朋友因为一个女人不要他自杀了
[01:19.520]我知道你天天听这种话 但我真的是你的超级粉丝
[01:22.820]我甚至弄到了你和Skam一起做的地下音乐
[01:25.620]
[01:25.960]我的房间贴满了你的海报跟照片
[01:28.900]我喜欢你和Rawkus合作的音乐，那棒极了
[01:31.800]无论怎样 我很希望你能看见这封信 给我回信吧 尽快回我 我们只是聊聊而已
[01:35.410]只是聊个天 我是你最忠诚的歌迷 斯坦
[01:37.800]
[01:38.370]茶越来越凉 我不知道为什么 始终辗转难眠
[01:44.050]清晨的雨遮住了我的窗 我根本就看不清
[01:50.030]能看到的只是一片灰色  但是你的照片在我的墙上
[01:56.090]它提醒着我 这不算坏 还不算太坏
[02:00.370]
[02:01.230]亲爱的斯利姆 你仍然没有回复 希望有机会你能回信
[02:03.730]希望有机会你能回信
[02:04.750]我还没生气 我只是认为你不给歌迷回复简直太糟糕了
[02:07.850]如果你不想在剧场外理我
[02:10.470]你可以不理 但至少应该为马修签个名
[02:13.560]那是我的弟弟 他只有六岁
[02:15.720]我在该死的寒风中等了四个小时 可你只是说了个不
[02:19.810]这太太太糟糕了伙计 那个小家伙可是把你当成了他的偶像
[02:22.710]他想成为你一样的人 他比我
[02:24.830]更喜欢你
[02:25.520]
[02:25.700]我没那么生气 我只是不喜欢被欺骗
[02:28.550]记得我们在丹佛的相遇吗 你说如果我写信
[02:31.480]你会回信的 我在某方面很像你
[02:33.820]我也不知道我爸是谁
[02:35.630]他总是背着我妈妈在外面鬼混而且还虐待她
[02:37.770]
[02:37.970]我能在你的歌里看到自己
[02:40.390]所以在那些心情沮丧的日子里 我就飙着车漂着移听着你的歌
[02:43.350]因为只有你的歌能帮我
[02:46.480]我甚至在胸口纹上你的名字
[02:49.170]
[02:49.590]有时我也割开手腕看它到底能流多少血
[02:52.600]那样非常刺激 那些痛处一阵阵向我袭来
[02:55.140]看吧 你说的什么事都是对的 我尊重你因为你告诉了我
[02:58.000]因为你把它告诉了我
[02:58.550]我女友开始嫉妒 因为我24小时都在谈论你
[03:01.530]但她不像我一样了解你 没人能
[03:04.330]他们不会明白有着我们这样成长经历的人
[03:07.410]你一定要回信 我是你永远不能失去的最忠实的歌迷
[03:09.440]最忠实的歌迷
[03:10.250]你真诚的朋友，斯坦 PS：我们应该在一起的
[03:13.380]
[03:13.550]茶越来越凉 我不知道为什么 始终辗转难眠
[03:20.030]清晨的雨遮住了我的窗 我根本就看不清
[03:26.030]能看到的只是一片灰色  但是你的照片在我的墙上
[03:32.040]它提醒着我 这不算坏 还不算太坏
[03:36.810]
[03:37.050]亲爱的从不理粉丝先生
[03:40.270]这将是我寄给你的最后一件包裹
[03:43.390]六个月了 你一个字都没回 我不配得到你的回信吗
[03:46.000]我知道你收到了最近的两封信 我把地址写得清清楚楚
[03:49.480]
[03:49.670]这回是我要寄给你的磁带 我希望你能听到
[03:52.140]我正在开车 时速90km/h
[03:55.380]嘿 斯利姆 我喝了五瓶伏特加 你说我还能开车吗
[03:58.900]你知道Phil Collins的一首歌“The Air In The Night"吗
[04:01.850]讲的是有一个人可以救另一个落水的人
[04:04.690]但那家伙没有去救 而菲尔看到了事件的全部过程 然后在一场表演时落水者的鬼魂找上了他
[04:07.580]那有点像我们的这种情况 你本可以救我
[04:10.470]但已经太晚了 我早已服下了一千片安眠药昏昏欲睡
[04:13.040]
[04:13.290]我想要的只是一封该死的回信
[04:16.340]我想让你知道我从墙上撕下了你所有的照片
[04:19.530]斯利姆我爱你 我们本该在一起的 想想吧
[04:22.920]而你却毁了这一切 我诅咒你也不安眠 我会出现在你梦里
[04:26.050]我会让你在梦中尖叫着吓醒
[04:29.000]我希望你的良知将你一点点吞噬 诅咒你离开我你就不能呼吸
[04:32.380]看看吧斯利姆 闭嘴碧池 我在说话呢
[04:34.560]嘿斯利姆 那是我的女友在后备箱中尖叫
[04:37.490]但我没有切开她的喉咙
[04:38.760]我只是把她绑了起来 看吧 我不像你一样
[04:40.560]因为窒息会让她更痛苦 而且她马上也要死掉了
[04:42.710]而且她马上也要死掉了
[04:43.880]好了 该挂断了 我已经到桥上了
[04:46.750]噢 见鬼 我忘记了 我怎么才能把磁带寄出去呢
[04:49.800]
[04:50.740]（刹车声 撞击声 简短的寂静 落水声）
[04:59.490]
[05:01.890]茶越来越凉 我不知道为什么 始终辗转难眠
[05:08.060]清晨的雨遮住了我的窗 我根本就看不清
[05:14.050]能看到的只是一片灰色  但是你的照片在我的墙上
[05:20.180]它提醒着我 这不算坏 还不算太坏
[05:24.950]
[05:25.530]亲爱的斯坦 我想尽快的回信 但我真的是太忙
[05:28.480]你说你的女友怀孕了 她还有多久生产
[05:31.560]听着 我很荣幸你能给你女儿起名叫Bonnie
[05:34.420]并且我有一份送你弟弟的签名
[05:36.010]我把它写在了你的棒球帽上
[05:37.590]
[05:37.880]我很抱歉我没能在演出时见你 我一定不小心错过了你
[05:40.910]不要认为我是故意地瞧不起你
[05:43.920]但是你说你也喜欢割自己的手腕是什么情况
[05:47.050]我在歌中说的只不过是玩笑话而已
[05:48.570]伙计 你怎么能把它当真
[05:49.900]你的思想有些问题 斯坦 我想你可能需要些咨询
[05:52.550]来帮助你不去做一些疯狂的举动
[05:55.720]
[05:56.120]还有你说的“我们注定在一起”是什么意思
[05:58.220]这种类型的话只会使我不想认识你
[06:01.450]我真心认为你和你的女友需要彼此
[06:04.400]或者你只需要对她好点
[06:06.860]我希望你有机会看到这封信
[06:08.520]希望这封信及时送到你手上
[06:10.330]赶在你伤害自己之前 我觉得你现在或许还好
[06:13.290]如果这封信能让你轻松一点的话 我会很高兴 但是斯坦
[06:16.460]你为什么那么生气试着理解一下我 我确实想让你作为我的粉丝
[06:20.070]我只是不想你去做一些疯狂的事
[06:22.530]我在新闻上看到了一篇发生在几周前让我很不舒服的事
[06:25.680]一个人醉酒驾车从桥上坠落
[06:28.470]把他的女友关在后备箱里
[06:30.370]她还怀着孕
[06:31.350]在车里警方发现了一个录音带 但他们没有透露是给谁的
[06:34.360]试着好好想想吧 他的名字是...是你
[06:37.550]他妈的
[06:40.030]
[06:40.320]
